#summary Setting up the Dev environment for Myriad.

== Subversion ==
We use subversion for version checking. Download the subclipse plugin for Eclipse at <http://subclipse.tigris.org/servlets/ProjectProcess?pageID=p4wYuA> <br>

Our subversion server is:<br>
https://myriad-chessengine.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/<br>
Use your own credentials to log in (password is generated in the _Source_ tab)
